settings.name: blazeSolver
settings.description: Draws a box at the correct blaze

settings.name: blazeSolverLine
settings.description: Draws a line at the next blaze to kill (this is independent from blaze solver)

settings.name: blessingsDisplay
settings.description: Displays your current dungeon blessings

settings.name: changeblessingsDisplayLocation
settings.description: Changes The Display Location

settings.name: dungeonBossSplits
settings.description: Displays your current dungeon boss's splits

settings.name: changebossSplitsDisplay
settings.description: Changes The Display Location

settings.name: mobESP
settings.description: Draws a box in starred mob (not see through walls)

settings.name: dungeonProfitDisplay
settings.description: Displays the current chest's profit (only works in dungeons)

settings.name: changedungeonProfitDisplay
settings.description: Changes The Display Location

settings.name: croesusClicksMode
settings.description: Overlay renderer option only works with some texture packs

settings.name: croesusProfitDisplay
settings.description: Displays the current chest's profit inside of croesus

settings.name: changecroesusProfitDisplay
settings.description: Changes The Display Location

settings.name: croesusProfitMode
settings.description: Changes the mode for the display

settings.name: dungeonRunSplits
settings.description: Displays your current dungeon run's splits

settings.name: changeRunSplitsDisplay
settings.description: Changes The Display Location

settings.name: showSecretsClickedColor
settings.description: Changes the highlight color of the secret when you click it

settings.name: secretsSound
settings.description: Plays a sound whenever you get a dungeon secret (might not be 100% accurate on the pick up items)

settings.name: secretsSoundType
settings.description: The type of sound to play whenever you get a secret

settings.name: showCroesusClicks
settings.description: Highlights the chests you've clicked, the list resets once you lobby swap

settings.name: showExtraStats
settings.description: Automatically sends the /showextrastats command at the end of a run

settings.name: showSecretsClicked
settings.description: Draws a box in the clicked chest/wither essence/redstone skull

settings.name: bossBarFishing
settings.description: Adds a boss bar with hp/max hp of loot sharing mobs

settings.name: rgbTitleFishing
settings.description: Adds the rgb format to the timer entity

settings.name: timerTitleFishing
settings.description: Adds the fishing timer entity from hypixel to your screen

settings.name: gardenDisplay
settings.description: Displays most of the player's tab stuff for the garden

settings.name: changegardenDisplayLocation
settings.description: Changes The Display Location

settings.name: visitorProfitDisplay
settings.description: Displays most of the visitor's lore data and also the profit with copper and rare item. Neu visitor features breaks this feature

settings.name: changeVisitorProfitDisplay
settings.description: Changes The Display Location

settings.name: MyDiscord
settings.description: Join if you want to report a bug or want to make a suggestion

settings.name: mainEditGui
settings.description: Changes the display location for all the guis

settings.name: cratesWaypoints
settings.description: Draws a beacon beam like waypoint for every kuudra crate

settings.name: ftDisplay
settings.description: Displays your current fatal tempo time, hits and percent §4Might not be 100% accurate especially in last phase of kuudra t5 since it uses the terror stack's sounds

settings.name: changefatalTempoDisplay
settings.description: Changes The Display Location

settings.name: emissaryWaypoints
settings.description: Waypoints every emissary in the dwarven mines

settings.name: gemstonesProfit
settings.description: Makes an overlay that tells you how much you've made mining gemstones this session

settings.name: changeMiningProfitDisplay
settings.description: Changes The Display Location

settings.name: blockOverlay
settings.description: Draws a block overlay at the block you're currently looking at

settings.name: blockOverlayColor
settings.description: Changes the highlight color of the block overlay

settings.name: bonzoMaskInvincibilityTimer
settings.description: Displays a timer with the current invincibility for the bonzo mask

settings.name: changebonzoMaskInvisDisplay
settings.description: Changes The Display Location

settings.name: action
settings.description: Moves and size the Ragnarok Axe timer display

settings.name: phoenixInvincibilityTimer
settings.description: Displays a timer with the current invincibility for the phoenix pet

settings.name: changephoenixInvisDisplay
settings.description: Changes The Display Location

settings.name: ragnarokAxeTimer
settings.description: Accurate timer for the ragnarok axe cooldown (Useful for slayers/dungeons)

settings.name: RngMeter
settings.description: Displays your current RNG Meter dungeons or slayers automatically detecting them

settings.name: changerngMeterDisplay
settings.description: Changes The Display Location

settings.name: searchBar
settings.description: Displays a search bar that can let you well... search! item lore or item name

settings.name: changesearchBarLocation
settings.description: Changes The Display Location

settings.name: statsDisplay
settings.description: Displays your current stats that are in tab

settings.name: changestatsDisplayLocation
settings.description: Changes The Display Location

settings.name: bossSlainTimer
settings.description: Sends a chat msg with the time it took to kill the slayer (also uses scoreboard for checks)

settings.name: ghostTracker
settings.description: Displays stuff from your current ghost grinding session e.g total profit drops and current mf (scavenger profit isnt take into account since it's not accurate) §4Kills counter is not 100% accurate

settings.name: changeghostDisplayLocation
settings.description: Changes The Display Location

settings.name: powderMiningTracker
settings.description: Displays stuff from your current powder mining session

settings.name: changepowderDisplayLocation
settings.description: Changes The Display Location

settings.name: trophyFishingTracker
settings.description: Displays stuff from your current trophy fishing session §4Might not be 100% accurate

settings.name: changetrophyDisplayLocation
settings.description: Changes The Display Location
